text:
Cylance | Irvine, CA | http://cylance.com | Full-Time | Onsite

Looking for low level/kernel developers & .Net Engineers to work on the next-gen AV providing real protection against malware.

We are looking for passionate engineers to work on the actual AV product which runs on Windows, OSX and Linux.

If you are interested or want to learn more shoot me an email at: aespinoza@cyance.com
